attributes.additional_details:
Jails in California, New York, Ohio, Texas, countries; Spain and Iran are sending low level inmates and non-violence offenders home then why not in the UK ?

The Guardian has estimated that 800 deaths could be seen in UK prisons due to COVID-19 but the government has not once mentioned prisoners and what we will be doing to protect them.

I am concerned for all the elderly, diabetic, asthmatic and all high-risk patients in all prisons as their would be less staff in prisons too.
attributes.background:
This petition is to release low-level inmates who are at high risk of contracting COVID-19 and dying. 

My sister has a sentence of 2.5years. With positive cases in the prison the inmates are being isolated and visiting will soon be stopped. 

PLEASE RELEASE THE NON-VIOLENT PRISONERS ON CURFEW

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305604

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
